attributes.action: Reimburse Stamp Duty Paid on "exempted" priced houses bought between January and March 2010.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Either side of January - March, houses bought under £175,000 were exempt from stamp duty. Its not fair to punish those who struggled to buy a house in this 12 week period, when everyone else, before and after, will be exempt. 

The exemption was halted in Jaunary and reintroduced in March, AS A MEANS OF WINNING VOTES. 

It is wholly unfair to do this at the cost of those people, who struggled through this time to buy the same houses at the same prices, as those who will now not pay this tax.

PLEASE SUPPORT THIS MATTER.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
